title: How do you deal with cold hands?
body:
If you live in Victoria/Tasmania, the night time temperature around this time of year is ass. Flat out, good for nothin' ass.

While you're playing and your hands are away from your body, they start to get cold very fast.

The colder your hands are, the less reactive they are and the less precision you have.


What do you guys to keep your hands warm while playing? 
Or how do you deal with cold hands while playing?
